page.para: I live here with my fam/i/ly.
This is where we take our shoes off.
This is where we wash our hands.
This is where I hang my clothes.
This is where we keep our mats.
We cook tast/y food in the kitch/en.
We bring out the chairs for im/por/tant vis/i/tors!
You must vis/it my home. Come soon!
